name: Web Masters LLC
tag_list: software-development, microsoft-dynamics, erp-implementation, retail-pos, jewellery-erp, jewellery-software
overview:
Web Masters LLC was founded in 1989 (formerly known as Computer Point). It is based in Dubai, UAE with operations/clients across the Middle East and Asia. It has about 60 dedicated techno commercial professionals, and an experience of about 500 man-years behind us. Web Masters LLC has outstanding competences in highly reliable application development, enterprise solutions implementation, data warehousing and business intelligence. It integrates complex information systems and offers consulting, training and software solutions across the full spectrum of industries, including information technology, financial services, education, retail, manufacturing, gold and jewellery, construction, utilities, engineering and contracting. We are Microsoft Certified Partner and Microsoft Dynamics Partner. We implement Microsoft Dynamics Suite of products.

Vision, innovative thinking and determination have made Web Masters LLC one of the very few companies who have made a name for themselves in the IT Products segment in the global market. “Visual Wingold” from Web Masters LLC is the largest selling Gold and Jewellery Management Solution.

offices.address1: 104, Above Bank Melli Iran, Bank Street, Bur Dubai,
